conditions.name: Not Repeated if Recently Performed
conditions.text: Assessment is not repeated if performed within a specified prior timeframe and the patient's condition is stable.

provenance.text_snippet: If screening assessments completed within 14 days they do not need to be repeated on Day 1 if patient's condition has not changed
validation_flags: LLM returned TEMPORAL_PRIOR, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote states that assessments do not need to be repeated if they were completed within the last 14 days. This is a clear condition based on the timing of a prior assessment.

conditions.name: Early Termination Visit
conditions.text: Visit is performed only for subjects who prematurely discontinue treatment.

provenance.text_snippet: Treatment discontinuation visit to be performed only for the patients who prematurely discontinued treatment. For the patient who completed 3 years treatment (156 weeks), the last visit (Week 156) in
validation_flags: LLM returned VISIT_TRIGGERED, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote explicitly limits the 'Treatment discontinuation visit' to a specific subset of patients using the word 'only': those who prematurely discontinued treatment. This is a condition triggering a specific visit.

conditions.name: Post-Treatment, Pre-Recurrence
conditions.text: Applies to patients who have discontinued or completed treatment but have not yet experienced disease recurrence.

provenance.text_snippet: Follow-up until disease recurrence visits to performed for the patients who discontinue/completed treatment before disease recurrence
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_EVENT, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote clearly defines the sub-population to whom the follow-up visits apply: 'patients who discontinue/completed treatment before disease recurrence'. This is a condition based on clinical events.

conditions.name: Optional
conditions.text: Assessment is optional and may be performed at the discretion of the investigator or patient.

provenance.text_snippet: Optional: tumour sample at disease recurrence
provenance.rationale: The footnote explicitly states that the tumour sample collection is 'Optional', making it a conditional assessment.

conditions.name: Intolerance to Contrast Medium
conditions.text: An alternative imaging procedure is used if the patient is intolerant to the standard contrast medium.

provenance.text_snippet: In the rare case where a patient is intolerant of the contrast medium, the preferred imaging would be CT chest without contrast and MRI abdomen with contrast however non contrast abdominal CT will als
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_INDICATION, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote describes an alternative procedure to be used under the specific clinical condition of a patient being intolerant to contrast medium. This modifies how the activity is performed for a subset of subjects.
